query.query: SELECT count(*) cnt FROM "%%DATASOURCE%%" WHERE __time >= TIMESTAMP '2013-08-31' AND __time < TIMESTAMP '2013-09-01'

SELECT namespace, robot, count(*) "count", EARLIEST(added) firstAdded, LATEST(added) lastAdded, APPROX_COUNT_DISTINCT_DS_THETA(user) approxCountTheta from "%%DATASOURCE%%" group by 1, 2 order by 2, 1 limit 3
